extension.valueString: Step 1. Add all codes found using the following LOINC query: morphine (=system:Urine)?Step 2. Remove codes containing 6-Monoacetylmorphine or diamorphine in their description
Urine tests for naturally occuring opioids (i.e. opiates) that are specific to a particular natually occurring opioid and therefore do not have the general word 'opiates' in the long name.

name: opiate_specific_urine_drug_screening_tests
title: Opiate specific urine drug screening tests
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
description: Urine tests for naturally occuring opioids (i.e. opiates) that are specific to a particular natually occurring opioid and therefore do not have the general word 'opiates' in the long name.
purpose: Identification of urine drug tests where results can be used when considering pain management therapy
